name: TIFF/EP, Tag Image File Format/Electronic Photography (common name); ISO 12234-2:2001, Electronic still-picture imaging – Removable memory – Part 2: TIFF/EP image data format (formal name)
definition: A subtype of TIFF 6.0 that contains the TIFF/EP format identifier and conforms to certain restrictions on TIFF and EXIF tags, as described in ISO 12234-2:2001.  TIFF/EP_1 was intended as suitable as a raw camera image format and to be as compatible as possible with TIFF 6.0.
